import React, {useContext} from 'react'; import { DataContext } from '../context'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import {ButtonContainer} from './Button'; const Details = () => { const {detailProduct} = useContext(DataContext); const {id, title, img, price,info} = detailProduct return(

{title}

Your drink is {title}

Price: ${price}

What,s in your drink?

{info}

back to menu
) } export default Details;
